blogposts.description:
Up until recently I finally have an idea and motivation to create a cross-platform app to record moments and reminding important days between couple.

Therefore, its the best timing for me to explore the cool kid Flutter for iOS + android development.Its already in google playstore, iOS appstore still trying to get approved.
blogposts.title: Cross Platform App For Couple Reminding Important Days

blogposts.description:
In react native AwesomeProject example, it gets bundle files with 2 options:

  1. Load from development server
  2. Load from pre-bundled file on disk
blogposts.title: React Native Part 3

blogposts.description: React Native is a hot topic recently in mobile app development world. It can be easily installed via Facebook guide.
